animal.name: Sweet Blue Feet
animal.description: What do you do if you have BLUE feet? Show them off, of course!  …

animal.name: Dancing Blue-Footed Boobies
animal.description: A blue-footed booby talks with its feet. These birds do a dance to say they are a couple. Watch them dance! …

animal.name: Catching Kites in Flight
animal.description: These birds prefer life in the air. But to help them survive, scientists must bring them down to Earth. …

animal.description: Hola! We’re now in Spanish! Each month, a new Ranger Rick Jr. article will be available in Spanish. This month, read “SIMPÁTICOS PIES AZULES.” …

animal.name: Pigeon on a Merry-Go-Round
animal.description: Watch a pigeon ride on an air vent like a merry-go-round! …

animal.name: Kite Chicks: High and Fluffy
animal.description: Watch two kite chicks in their nest high in a loblolly pine tree in Florida. …

animal.description: An albatross lives at sea and comes ashore once a year to raise a family. Learn more about this amazing bird! …

animal.description: Watch penguins “fly” through the water! …

animal.description: abc

animal.name: At the Watering Hole
animal.description: Which animal at the watering hole is biggest? Which is smallest? …

animal.name: Swimming and Flying All-stars Are Streamlined
animal.description: Sleek shapes move more easily against the force of air or water. This makes them faster. …

animal.name: Each Animal Body is Just Right
animal.description: Fast or slow, whether 4-footed, 2-footed, or with no feet at all, every animal is perfectly suited to its lifestyle and habitat. …

animal.name: Zoobooks Seabirds Activities
animal.description: Swoop in to play along as we dive into these seabird games! …

animal.name: Seabirds Communicate by Displays
animal.description: A display can be a body movement, a sound, or even a physical change, like becoming more colorful. …

animal.name: Seabird Chicks Hatch From Eggs
animal.description: Most seabirds have a small skin patch called a brood patch at the bottom of their bellies. They use this as a blanket to keep their eggs warm. …

animal.name: Fabulous Feathers
animal.description: Feathers really are for the birds. No other animal has them. …

animal.name: An Emperor’s Tale
animal.description: It’s the middle of winter in the coldest place on Earth. But somehow, new life is just beginning. …
